document.full_text: a fifth of russia's state defense spending is stolen every year by corrupt officials, dishonest generals and crooked contractors, russia's chief military prosecutor said in an interview published on tuesday.
document.title: russia says a fifth of defense budget stolen
lines_and_colors: a fifth of russia's state defense spending is stolen every year by corrupt officials, dishonest generals and crooked contractors, russia's chief military prosecutor said in an interview published on tuesday.
